name: Office (DiamondLabs)
description:
A escape game...

You got up 2:AM in the morning to go work in your office. Once you are done at work and it is now 3:30 in the morning, you get up to open the door, but it was locked. You reach for your phone to check the password, but...then you remember that you left it at the job. Your objective is to figure out the password hidden in the room. But you have a time limit, If you don't find the password quickly, then...It...Will come...

W, A, S, D To Move, E to Interact, Mouse to look

HINT: the password starts with the letter "H"...
